channel.title: Client Help
channel.description: Hello my client wont load im running a 517 and using a 517 client I changed the ip in loader to the ip of my server compiled and still wont load it stops at connecting to update server! need help :o

item.title: Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Are you sure your running your server? and also you might need to update your java or jdk and once you done that edit the run and compiler and add the new version of java or jdk too it.

Ty - Zero
